mapper.select: /* get_total_member_count */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE 1=1

/* get_member_list */ SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS no, b.IDX, b.ID, b.NAME, b.LEVEL, b.TEL, date_format(b.REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as REGDATE , b.REGID, b.MODDATE, b.MODID, b.AGREE FROM MEMBER b, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY IDX DESC ) a WHERE no BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
